The "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph are:

1. V OC (open-circuit voltage)
2. I SC (short-circuit current)
3. FF (fill factor)
4. PCE (power conversion efficiency)

These entities are all presented in the same words as in the original paragraph, and they are summarized in Figure 3.

The entity "PCE" (power conversion efficiency) is not a material name and has been removed from the list.
